subject: Bobsledding
lead_paragraph: The two-time world and Olympic champion Andre Lange of Germany won his 40th World Cup bobsled race in a two-man competition in Altenberg, Germany. Lange and Kevin Kuske had a combined time of 1:52.60 over two runs. Sandra Kiriasis and Romy Losgsch of Germany won the women’s race in 1:55.7.
